issue.title: [Java] Extract a common interface for dictionary encoders
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8108](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8108). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In this issue, we extract a common interfaces from existing dictionary encoders. This can be useful for scenarios when the client does not care about the encoder implementations.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8108?focusedCommentId=17107923) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6608
